recordDetailInput.title: Record Detail Input
recordDetailInput.description: Fields and their values for the record to be updated. This input is the exact output of the ExtractFieldsAndValuesFromUserInput action.
recordDetailInput.einstein:description: Field-value pairs for the record to be updated. The value of this input parameter must be the exact output of ExtractFieldsAndValuesFromUserInput recordDetails, don't ever change the recordDetails output
